data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Saint-Louis, Senegal.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint-Louis, Senegal
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint-Louis.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 48 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Saint-Louis, Senegal.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the 1,420 believers in Saint-Louis to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,420 believers in Saint-Louis and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Maninka, Eastern people.
Lord, make the 1,420 believers in Saint-Louis to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 731,280 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 732,700 souls in Saint-Louis and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Saint-Louis, Senegal need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Saint-Louis
location.people_groups_list: Badyara, Mandingo, Mandinka, Wolof, Budik, Jahanka
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Badyara (12,000), Mandingo, Mandinka (956,000), Wolof (9,700), Budik (5,600), Jahanka (60,000)
